"Heya.":
"Crawford brought me up to speed.
Sounds like things are getting pretty serious."
"Is this the girl from the Floating Island? From Leciel?"

"...Anyways, jumping right into things,
can you show us how to get into Leciel?"

"The teleporter failed to start up.
It seems that it's been locked."

"Looks like this
is where I come in."
"...To think that Leciel serves as Halpha's controller unit..."

"What's more, that it sent down DOLLS and
Meteorn to make them fight each other."

"I have to admit, even I
didn't believe it at first."
"Hey, can we talk for a moment?"
"You kind of remind me how Manon was when she first arrived."

"Yeah, like that. Your behavior.
Can I ask you a bit more about Manon?"
"If it's within my ability to answer."

"I monitor her activity. Should a problem arise,
I provide her support."
"So you've always been watching Manon? From Leciel?"

"It wasn't something you could resolve from Leciel,
so you came to us for help?"
"What was Manon doing here on Halpha?"

"Manon's role was to document and record
the battles between ARKS and Dark Falz."
"No. She was only told what she needed to know."
"No. She watched them unfold and reported the outcome."
"So she wasn't a leader of this project... just an observer?"
"In other words, all she was supposed to do was watch the people of Halpha."
"She could've kept her distance and blended in as just another Meteorn."

"But this means, to my knowledge, Manon deliberately went
out of her way to become involved with us."
"Perhaps she had a change of heart after arriving here?"

"The administrator for the experiment on Halpha.
The governor of Resurgent ARKS."
"And this Zephetto is the one who started this \"experiment\"?"

"Zephetto is the one who created us.
Like a... father or a mother."

"If this Zephetto has
full authority over Leciel..."

"Then if we can persuade him or otherwise disarm him,
then the war against the DOLLS will be over..."
"According to the records, it started 300 years ago."

"Then... an uncountable amount of ARKS were
sacrificed, all for this experiment..."

"What was the definitive reason
Manon decided to confront Zephetto?"

"While I was monitoring Manon's data,
I could see feelings of intense anger."

"So Manon really does intend to
put an end to this by herself."
"But isn't this one for short distances?"

"It may look like one, but it's
actually a hundred times stronger."

"Even without a stable Photon Field,
it's capable of extremely long distances."

"Alright, let's call everyone and
board this so-called Leciel, shall we?"

"We've just finished preparations
to head for Leciel, so--"

"No, our foray into
Leciel will have to wait."

"A grand offensive from the DOLLS.
They're raining down all over Halpha right now."

"I've heard nothing on my end... You're saying
they evaded my entire security network?"

"I've sent word to Taivas. I'll send
whatever support we can spare."

"...Well, you heard him. I'm gonna go
meet up with my siblings right away."

"We're going to Leciel.
You'll have to protect your own regions."
"We can't ignore the situation with Manon."

"When the situation here allows for it,
I'll send a team after you."

"Until then, if things get too dangerous,
I want you to return immediately."
"I guess you haven't fully recovered then."

"Before I came here, Manon was
headed for a DOLLS manufacturing facility."
"I don't know where she would be by now."

"Leciel has blocked itself off
from outside communications."

"We'll be right behind you as soon as
we've taken care of things here."
